scripts.compile: npx circom circuits/withdraw.circom -o build/withdraw.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/withdraw.json
scripts.setup: npx snarkjs setup --protocol groth -c build/withdraw.json --pk build/withdraw_proving_key.json --vk build/withdraw_verification_key.json
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && npm run compile && npm run setup
scripts.test: npm run build && npx snarkjs calculatewitness -c build/withdraw.json -i circuits/input.json -w build/witness.json && npx snarkjs proof -w build/witness.json --pk build/withdraw_proving_key.json -p build/proof.json --pub build/public.json && npx snarkjs verify --vk build/withdraw_verification_key.json -p build/proof.json --pub build/public.json
